name: Hachi's Farm
description:
A short demo  game loosely based on farming. 

Farm crops, water them and harvest it for gold.

Mining and fishing system incorporated.

Weather system enabled. 

Give gifts to villagers to increase affection and trigger event. Villagers will have their favorite/hated gifts. Choose wisely.

Seduce your woman and marry her.

There are more to just a simple farm. Will you discover it's secrets?

PS: Sorry, game creation in still in the beginning phase. Just releasing a demo for now.
